Field Note: Record the date/time according to the ISO 8601, the International Standard for the representation of dates and times (http://www.iso.org/iso/home.html).  The date/time should be recorded to the level of granularity known (e.g., year, year and month, complete date plus hours and minutes, etc.).

Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Discharge to rehabilitation unit | 2, Discharge to other hospital | 3, Discharge to nursing home | 4, Discharge to home/private residence | 5, Not applicable - patient died | 6, Other, specify | 7, Unknown
